frameset.edef: to become, to reach, to get to

(TOP (S (VP (IV3MS+IV يِحْفَظ) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (IVSUFF_DO:1P نا)) (PP (PREP لِ) (NP (NOUN حَدّ) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ما) (S (VP (IV1P+IV نِوْصَل) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP (PREP لَ) (NP (NOUN بَرّ) (NP (DET+NOUN الأَمان))))))))))))
